name: Optimus Advantage
overview:
Optimus Advantage LLC offers a B2B solution for making international payments and associate those payments with business documents, such as purchase orders and invoices.

Optimus Advantage was founded in May of 2011 and started to actively market in January of 2013. Optimus enables international businesses to use their own business documents to associate with payments. Optimus provides businesses with a method to retrieve only subject related business documents with payment information.

Optimus Advantage uses SAP HANA to store and rapidly search and retrieve electronic business documents. SAP HANA is offered by SAP, a world leader in enterprise software and services. SAP HANA is a revolutionary memory appliance capable of storing over 250 terabytes of data in random access memory, providing an unprecedented speed in rapidly accessing vast amounts of information, such as electronic documents.

Optimus uses Adobe EchoSign to provide secure electronic signatures to businesses to assure authenticity of documents and signatures. EchoSign is a proven leader in web contracting and eSignatures solutions.

Optimus Advantage LLC wins Honorable Mention in “SAP HANA One Innovative Contest” awarded February 5, 2013:

Click here to see award: http://www.saphana.com/community/learn/cloud-info/sap-hana-one-innovative-app-contest/winners

Click here to see a video about how Optimus Advantage uses SAP HANA: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IWqwN–ZwZc

Best regards,

Michael Harris, Founder & CTO Optimus Advantage LLC Website: www.optimusadvantage.com Phone: 847-905-1000 LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/isiglobal
